Rulings.Edison:
●The effect of “Maji-Gire Panda” is a Trigger Effect that activates when 1 or more Beast-Type monster●You can chain to the activation of “Maji-Gire Panda”’s effect, including with “Divine Wrath”.
●If 2 or more Beast-Type monsters are destroyed at the same time, the ATK of “Maji-Gire Panda” only increases by 500 points.
●Beast-Type tokens like “Sheep Tokens” are included and will increase the ATK of “Maji-Gire Panda” when destroyed.
●Monsters changed to Beast-Type by “DNA Surgery” are included and will increase the ATK of “Maji-Gire Panda” when destroyed.
●Beast-Type monsters on your opponent’s side of the field are included and will increase the ATK of “Maji-Gire Panda” when destroyed.
●When face-down Beast-Type monsters are destroyed (by a card effect), the ATK of “Maji-Gire Panda” does not increase.
●The ATK increase from the effect of “Maji-Gire Panda” remains as long as “Maji-Gire Panda” remains face-up on the field.
Rulings.Tengu:
●The effect of “Maji-Gire Panda” is a Trigger Effect that activates when 1 or more Beast-Type monster(s) are destroyed. If the monsters were destroyed as a result of battle, the timing of this effect is at the end of the Damage Step, when the monsters are sent to the GY.
●You can chain to the activation of “Maji-Gire Panda”’s effect, including with “Divine Wrath”.
●If 2 or more Beast-Type monsters are destroyed at the same time, the ATK of “Maji-Gire Panda” only increases by 500 points.
●Beast-Type tokens like “Sheep Tokens” are included and will increase the ATK of “Maji-Gire Panda” when destroyed.
●Monsters changed to Beast-Type by “DNA Surgery” are included and will increase the ATK of “Maji-Gire Panda” when destroyed.
●Beast-Type monsters on your opponent’s side of the field are included and will increase the ATK of “Maji-Gire Panda” when destroyed.
●When face-down Beast-Type monsters are destroyed (by a card effect), the ATK of “Maji-Gire Panda” does not increase.
●The ATK increase from the effect of “Maji-Gire Panda” remains as long as “Maji-Gire Panda” remains face-up on the field.
Rulings.Goat:
●The effect of “Maji-Gire Panda” is a Trigger Effect that activates when 1 or more Beast monster(s) are destroyed. If the monsters were destroyed by battle, the timing of this effect is at the end of the Damage Step, when the monsters are sent to the GY.
●You can chain to the activation of “Maji-Gire Panda”’s effect, including with “Divine Wrath”.
●If 2 or more Beast monsters are destroyed at the same time, the ATK of “Maji-Gire Panda” only increases by 500 points.
●Beast tokens like “Sheep Tokens” are included and will increase the ATK of “Maji-Gire Panda” when destroyed.
●Monsters changed to Beast by “DNA Surgery” are included and will increase the ATK of “Maji-Gire Panda” when destroyed.
●Beast monsters on your opponent’s side of the field are included and will increase the ATK of “Maji-Gire Panda” when destroyed.
●When face-down Beast monsters are destroyed (by a card effect), the ATK of “Maji-Gire Panda” does not increase.
●The ATK increase from the effect of “Maji-Gire Panda” remains as long as “Maji-Gire Panda” remains face-up on the field.

● You can chain to the activation of “Maji-Gire Panda”’s effect, including with “Divine Wrath”.

Rulings.Base:
1. The effect of "Maji-Gire Panda" is a Trigger Effect that activates when 1 or more Beast-Type monster(s) are destroyed. If the monsters were destroyed as a result of battle, the timing of this effect is at the end of the Damage Step, when the monsters are sent to the GY.
2. You can chain to the activation of the effect of "Maji-Gire Panda", including with "Divine Wrath".
3. If 2 or more Beast-Type monsters are destroyed at the same time, the ATK of "Maji-Gire Panda" only increases by 500 points.
4. Beast-Type tokens like 'Sheep Tokens' are included and will increase the ATK of "Maji-Gire Panda" when destroyed.
5. Monsters changed to Beast-Type by "DNA Surgery" are included and will increase the ATK of "Maji-Gire Panda" when destroyed.
6. Beast-Type monsters on your opponent's side of the field are included and will increase the ATK of "Maji-Gire Panda" when destroyed.
7. When face-down Beast-Type monsters are destroyed (by a card effect), the ATK of "Maji-Gire Panda" does not increase.
8. The ATK increase from the effect of "Maji-Gire Panda" remains as long as "Maji-Gire Panda" remains face-up on the field.
